title: league of legend wont load neither the alpah client help i cant stay with out league
body: so guys i deleted league of legends everything it was fully working but not the old client the new one was fully working when i download league of legends the old client wasnt working neither the new one so i cant play league of legends at this moment can u guys find a solution to this i have been trying to fix this problem but i couldnt please find me a solution nd explain to me as clear as possible plz reply its very urgent

replies.body: Can you ensure you're launching League as admin, in case this is caused by improper system permissions? Simply right-click on the shortcut and select *run as administrator*. If this caused no change, please give me more details as to where you're running into issues running League and what error messages or behavior you're seeing.
